full_text: Buckingham Palace issued a neutral, conciliatory response, saying that “the issues raised, particularly of race, are concerning...they will be addressed by the family privately” https://t.co/kOloXRNouI

localize.full_text: 白金汉宫做出了中立、和解的回应，称 "所提出的问题，特别是种族问题，令人担忧......将由家族私下解决 "https://t.co/kOloXRNouI。
白金漢宮做出了中立、和解的迴應，稱 "所提出的問題，特別是種族問題，令人擔憂......將由家族私下解決 "https://t.co/kOloXRNouI。
